general_testimonials.author: Michelle
general_testimonials.text: I’ve done yoga before, but nothing like this. The way MAHA weaves breath, movement, kriya and meditation feels so much deeper than anything else I have tried before. Each day MAHA 21 brought me closer to myself. I cried. I laughed. I softened. I opened. I remembered how to love myself again. This is the kind of work the world needs more of.

general_testimonials.author: Amber
general_testimonials.text: Low key it will change your life

general_testimonials.author: Paul
general_testimonials.text: The whole experience, the MAHA Method, it just worked, my experience was way better than I could have imagined. I love what MAHA Collective stands for.

general_testimonials.author: Diane
general_testimonials.text: Alessandra has a presence about her… Her energy has the ability to transform.

general_testimonials.author: Joanna
general_testimonials.text: I loved the progression from start to finish. Alessandra’s voice and presence made me feel so safe. I was able to reach a place so deep within and I will be forever grateful to you for that.

general_testimonials.author: Imogen
general_testimonials.text: Everyone needs to try the MAHA Method, it enlivens your day and your mind. What a way to live with the MAHA Method - Thank you!

general_testimonials.author: Kate
general_testimonials.text: I felt Alessandra’s guidance and love throughout the process, she gave me strength to reach new levels within myself, unlock emotions and breathe. I feel this experience has unlocked a deeper sense of being a purpose in me. Thank you

general_testimonials.author: Shara
general_testimonials.text: What you offer is an absolute highlight. Best class of the week
Beyond incredible, I’ve never felt and seen the stuff I did in Savasana, I had to hold back laughter because I was so full of joy… seriously incredible….

general_testimonials.author: Dean
general_testimonials.text: Practicing with you is my Sunday church. I will never miss a class with Alessandra, what you offer is like nothing else I’ve experienced before.

general_testimonials.author: Giorgia
general_testimonials.text: Every part of the MAHA experience feels intentional. The music, the energy, the words. It’s like therapy for the soul, but embodied. This is what true healing feels like.

general_testimonials.author: Emma
general_testimonials.text: The MAHA Method is the way

general_testimonials.author: Toula
general_testimonials.text: Alessandra and The MAHA Method helped me trust myself again. In my body, in my path, in life. That is a gift I will never forget.

maha_21_testimonials.author: Dean
maha_21_testimonials.text: Maha 21 was a profound journey for me. I’ve struggled with anxiety and self-doubt for years, and it often felt like I was stuck in my head, disconnected from my heart. The consistent daily practice created space for me to slow down, breathe, and truly feel. I began to notice self-love that I hadn’t experienced before. I feel more peaceful, more grounded, and more open to love in all its forms.

maha_21_testimonials.author: Sarah
maha_21_testimonials.text: I was in a really low place, recovering from illness, barely moving, and with no energy or desire to even leave the house. Since practising MAHA 21 with Alessandra, everything has shifted. I feel energised, alive, and inspired to live fully again. You’ve given me back my vitality.

maha_21_testimonials.author: Jesse
maha_21_testimonials.text: Maha 21 truly transformed my life. The time I invested felt nothing compared to the rewards I received. This practice opened my eyes to what truly matters. After completing Maha 21, I found the courage to make the changes I’d been avoiding for years such as quitting my job and putting myself first. It gave me the clarity and strength to live a life that feels authentic and deeply fulfilling.

maha_21_testimonials.author: Maria
maha_21_testimonials.text: Maha 21 brought me so much peace. My mind was less busy. I feel stronger and happier than ever before. Thank you Alessandra

maha_21_testimonials.author: Sophie
maha_21_testimonials.text: Before Maha 21, I felt so guarded like my heart was wrapped in layers of protection. I longed to open but didn’t know how. This program was exactly what I needed. The daily practice of breath, movement, and meditation gently softened those walls. Over the 21 days, I noticed a beautiful shift: old emotional heaviness began to lift, and I found myself more present, more connected not only to myself but to those around me. It felt like coming home to a part of me I had forgotten. I’m deeply grateful for this experience and would recommend it to anyone ready to open their heart and live more fully from love.

maha_21_testimonials.author: Tali
maha_21_testimonials.text: MAHA 21 helped me trust myself again. That is a gift I will never forget. I can't thank Alessandra enough.

maha_21_testimonials.author: Sharon
maha_21_testimonials.text: There’s something magnetic about MAHA. It’s not just movement, it’s a way of living. I’m seeing the world differently now, more colour, more connection, more me.

maha_21_testimonials.author: Tom
maha_21_testimonials.text: MAHA felt like a homecoming. I’ve tried so many practices over the years, but this… this touched something deeper. I left feeling clear, expanded, and full of love.

maha_21_testimonials.author: Amy
maha_21_testimonials.text: There’s a depth to MAHA that’s hard to put into words. It’s like it speaks directly to your soul. After just one session, I knew I’d found something truly special.

maha_21_testimonials.author: Ella
maha_21_testimonials.text: The combination of breath, movement, and meditation opened a new doorway inside me. I feel so much calmer, more connected to myself and the world around me, and ready to receive the love I deserve. I feel indebted with gratitude to MAHA Collective, thank you Alessandra

maha_21_testimonials.author: Emma
maha_21_testimonials.text: What a profound experience. The maha way of living allows you to come home to your true self, your authentic self. The visualisation of seeing myself and saying ‘thank you i love you” felt like a warm hug. The self compassion and gratitude I felt in that moment was unmatched. I can't wait to continue this, step into my higher self and give back with my love.
